short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View all your tabs from one page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View many different tabs in the same screen, just by loading the different URLs. Load any video from YouTube, or Netflix, any web page such as Wikipedia or Google, and view them all on the same tab that you are currently looking at.
